title: Forte de Nª Sª do Amparo
original_title: Forte de Nª Sª do Amparo
body: Of triangular design, it was built in 1706, at no expense to the Royal Treasury. According to an inscription, Francisco Dias Franco was responsible for the construction and was its first captain. Located near the promenade of Machico, it was the last to surrender during the landing of the Miguelist troops in 1828.
